Reviews.Title: Lorex ACC1511 Power Adapter Accessory Pack
Reviews.Author: Paddy
Reviews.Content: Gread product. More than half the price than the Lorex site (and additional adapters not included by ordering from Lorex.)

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: AH Shelter
Reviews.Content: We are a homeless shelter for families with children and had purchased a new security camera.  During installation it was discovered we could use two of our older cameras more efficiently by purchasing the Lorex ACC1511 Power Adapter Accessory Pack.  We found on-line cheaper than anywhere else!  Came in a timely manner.  Was puuuurfect for what we needed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Adapter - Worked Perfectly!
Reviews.Author: Jamie Ratliff
Reviews.Content: I needed to use newer cameras on an older Lorex system that did not support 6-pin cables (only BNC). This adapter allowed me to keep my current 6-pin cameras in place and covert them to BNC right at the Lorex system without running any cable. Installation was a breeze and literally takes only a few minutes. Highly recommended. This package makes it possible to connect four Lorex 6-Pin DIN cameras to BNC connectors.

Reviews.Title: works as expected
Reviews.Author: T. S. Cortez
Reviews.Content: item works as it should and a great price I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a power supply for your camera system

Reviews.Title: Good option if you have Lorex pinout
Reviews.Author: EBGwd
Reviews.Content: These are exactly what you need to work with those non-bnc connectors for Lorex cameras.  The price is much better than the Lorex prices.  Mine works great and saved me a few bucks.

Reviews.Title: An excellent Item.
Reviews.Author: Humberto Parodi
Reviews.Content: I use this item with my video security system and work excellent. I recommend to anyone to use this item.

Reviews.Title: Hard to find other than Amazon
Reviews.Author: MCWarlock
Reviews.Content: Perfect replacement for my lost Lorex adapters. Used on a system I bought from Costco. 8 channels/cameras. Works perfectly. OK

Reviews.Title: They fit and do the job.
Reviews.Author: Harold Zechner
Reviews.Content: If you use a Lorex security system with the 6-Pin mini DIN female to BNC male and RCA male & power barrel female you must use these to hook up a normal camera or security system that uses only one video input and one power input.  While I question the amount Lorex charges for this kit there is no doubt it does do the job.

Reviews.Title: Great Idea
Reviews.Author: paul
Reviews.Content: This adapter set works great on my security system cameras. I plugged them in and had no issues with reception. If you have analog system and want to hook up a NVR or DVR this will work great to adapt your cameras. I would purchase this item again. Thanks Lorex.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Michael C
Reviews.Content: Adding a second set of cameras to my system and this allows multiple cameras to be powered by a single outlet. Works just great and have not had any issues.

Reviews.Title: it is what it is, it does what it says
Reviews.Author: D. SKye Hodges
Reviews.Content: I wanted to replace two power adapters that went out, and having a 4-way splitter allowed me to take out two more adapters. Very great product!

Reviews.Title: Worked great with my older cameras
Reviews.Author: Robert B. Eiland
Reviews.Content: Had to have this for my older cameras. Worked great and no problem hooking it up quickly. Word word word.

Reviews.Title: Everything you need in one box
Reviews.Author: Einstein
Reviews.Content: All the adapters and power connectors you need to hook up the cameras to a DVR. Works as described. Recommended

Reviews.Title: Does what it's supposed to
Reviews.Author: TechGeek
Reviews.Content: Plug and play, and it works!  It includes BNC to RCA connector/converters which is convenient if you need them.  Color coding is nice.

Reviews.Title: Review on Lorex Power Adapter Acessory Pack
Reviews.Author: aptpath
Reviews.Content: No problems with the product, it is what it is. After shopping around for lowest prices, Amazon had everybody beat. I don't know why distributors are charging so much; probably because if you need it, they know you will pay. My only complaint is the price; way too high.

Reviews.Title: It works! but the price!
Reviews.Author: Ralph Nader
Reviews.Content: It works. It came on time! Next day delivery for 5 bucks when ordered on SUNDAY in Phoenix! I just can't believe the inflated price... But still priced lower than the rest.I'm a professional low-voltage contractor and my customer insisted that we utilize his cheaply made Lorex cameras for his commercial property despite the fact that half of them have already burnt out.So I need to integrate his Lorex cameras (which have 6-pin DIN connectors) into a professional brand DVR (Of course, only accepts BNC as an industry standard). I discover that I can only find these Lorex power adapters at a handful of stores. Thankfully, Amazon was one of them. Despite Amazon's high price on this item, it was lower than the rest of the online distributors.

Reviews.Title: It works fine.
Reviews.Author: B.
Reviews.Content: I used in my work with a Lorex cameras system to provide power the cameras.Works fine, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Useless
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: I was told by a Lorex QA manager to purchase one of these for the system I have. Does not work and is useless. Could not return did not have the option for a refund just an exchange.
